Articles.Content:
I have a small suggestion, I find it takes a while to go from the VAB to the main menu and I think it would be cool if there was a button to take you from the VAB right to the main menu.

Thoughts?

I wouldn't mind having an option like that, it takes a lot of time to get from the VAB to the main menu. I've tested it right now, it takes almost 30 seconds on my PC, and I have a Q9550 cpu, 6Gb RAM and a GTX 650.
